reviews.title: Painless experience
reviews.text: We dealt through a broker but the process was painless

reviews.title: It seemed a much more personal service
reviews.text: Helpful and friendly staff from initial criteria query onwards, through underwriting and to completion. Very happy with the process and outcome. It seemed a much more personal service than you would get with the mainstream lenders.

reviews.title: Mortgages
reviews.text: As an older applicant for a mortgage they were most helpful and I now own the new house.

reviews.title: Beverley BS made my experience interesting
reviews.text: I have recently went semi retired and wanted to change my mortgage to interest only Mortgage. My then Mortgage provider could not a interest only Mortgage therefore I was forced to test the market. I came across The Beverley BS and made contact and I was offered an interest only Mortgage that suited my requirements. The service I received was professional, friendly and comprehensive. The whole experience was beyond my expectations.

reviews.title: Everything ran so smoothly.
reviews.text: Everything ran so smoothly. The solicitor covered everything on our behalf.

reviews.title: customer service
reviews.text: I have only been in contact maybe twice with the society and staff were pleasant and polite also professional as well.

reviews.title: great service from all staff, particularly Austin.
reviews.text: great service from all staff, particularly Austin.

reviews.title: Once we got through and dealt with Beverley direct i...
reviews.text: Once we got through and dealt with Beverley direct it was so good to have point of contact and everything went swiftly and we managed to source our self build mortgage

reviews.title: Professional, Efficient, Courteous
reviews.text: Prompt efficient, friendly help from staff memebers, made all the difference. Thank you.

reviews.title: Friendly, Informative, Professional
reviews.text: They are approachable and friendly, always answer y queries and sort me out a good value for money deal.

reviews.title: Just so easy from start to finish.
reviews.text: Just so easy from start to finish. Fantastic communication throughout.

reviews.title: Personalised service provided and extremely responsi...
reviews.text: Personalised service provided and extremely responsive and helpful,

reviews.title: Excellent communication
reviews.text: Excellent, I am pretty clueless when it comes to mortgages but the information sent and the communication with my mortgage advisor was great all the way through from applying to eventually moving and beginning payments

reviews.title: Number 1 Building Society
reviews.text: Avery efficient, friendly and customer focused operation. A local business, serving local people, staffed by local people. It is so refreshing in this age to deal with real people whether on the phone or in store.

reviews.title: Slight hiccup but overall excellent customer service
reviews.text: The process for re-mortgaging went well although we had a hiccup on completion day as funds didn't seem to arrive with our previous lender when they were supposed to. The problem was resolved and the customer service following this hiccup was very good.

reviews.title: Very straight forward process to secure our mortgage.
reviews.text: Very straight forward process to secure our mortgage. Good product no hidden costs very transparent

reviews.title: The contact with Beverley and their employee Jacob C...
reviews.text: The contact with Beverley and their employee Jacob Chambers has been outstanding. I have used them before and wanted to extend my mortgage .The process was easy, timely and above all felt like thy wanted to do their best. Very hard to recommend them too highly !!

reviews.title: Excellent service from Austin and Jacob for our self...
reviews.text: Excellent service from Austin and Jacob for our self build. Banking how it should be.

reviews.title: New mortgage holder with Society.
reviews.text: New mortgage holder with Society.Contacted mortgage advisor with queries.Excellent response and help..Very friendly .

reviews.title: Remortgaged to Beverley Building Society the process...
reviews.text: Remortgaged to Beverley Building Society the process went smoothly

reviews.title: Senior Mortgage
reviews.text: Very professional response from the outset. Choices were clearly investigated and explained.

reviews.title: Retirement interest-only remortgage
reviews.text: I cannot recommend Beverley Building Society highly enough. From the initial enquiry to completion of the remortgage my experience was one of friendly professionalism and a seamless process. Maria explained fully all my options at enquiry and application stage offering friendly professional advice and made the application an enjoyable and reassuring process. I felt she understood my situation very well. The product recommended for me was competitive and had a degree of flexibility in that I could make extra payments if I wished to, up to a certain percentage. Alix then took over the administration of the remortgage application, kept me informed throughout with prompt queries and responses. Kate at the firm of solicitors dealing with the remortgage was similarly prompt and efficient and I was kept up to date with the progress of the application. it was a very smooth and pleasant process so a big thank you to the team!

reviews.title: Tailored Service
reviews.text: Our specific borrowing needs were fully understood and acted upon promptly and efficiently and we were kept up to date at all times as the process progressed. We had great confidence in the member of the lending team that we dealt and were honest with us at all times

reviews.title: Everyone has been so helpful
reviews.text: Everyone has been so helpful. Such a great team. Everyone has been so helpful,

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Great service throughout. Very easy to deal with. Couldn’t have been easier. Mortgage quotation and application process was simple and easy to understand. Approval likewise.

reviews.title: Efficient, quick and friendly
reviews.text: Very friendly and helpful staff, our experience with a remortgage was completed quickly and efficiently.

reviews.title: Mortgage
reviews.text: required the mortgage for flexibility in my finances, Beverley handled very well where others would not do because of our ages.

reviews.title: Easy a simple transfer
reviews.text: Our mortgage was transferred to Beverley BS. Simple and hassle free

reviews.title: Helping us complete our family home
reviews.text: We have a complex build in that our property is grade 2 star listed and has a thatched roof, we struggled to find anyone who would give us a mortgage but Beverly did and they have been brilliant. Customer service is great and there is always someone at the end of the phone to guide you if you need it ! Hope to stay with them when we switch to a standard mortgage providing the rates are competitive

reviews.title: Good supportive service
reviews.text: I was after a remortgage to make an extension on my property and was declined by most lenders since I had purchased the freehold under my name which I thought was the right thing to do! Beverly offered me a built-in mortgage which was very helpful and they did released the funds in two lump sum with the bigger sum first so I can pay the contractor to start the project. Austin from Bevery who was in charge of my application was very helpful and I’m very pleased with the overall service. They even gave me a discounted rate at the end when my residential property was completed.

reviews.title: Beverley Building Society market leaders
reviews.text: As an existing customer, we approached Beverley Building Society about renewing our mortgage as its term was ending. Again for the second time we cannot fault the service and attention to our individual needs from start to finish. Jacob kept us informed from start to finish. Highly recommend them for any service they offer. Dependable and local, personal service and not automated like most of the big companies!

reviews.title: A lot of hard work
reviews.text: Having remortgaged before this was the most cumbersome process not helped by rude and unhelpful solicitors

reviews.title: Re-mortage
reviews.text: The BBS has provided us with excellent service. Other provides adopt a rigid approach to issuing a mortgage, but the Beverly considered a bespoke approach, recognising our particular financial circumstances and providing a much better product than any of the Main Street alternatives. We are delighted with the prompt and friendly service provided.

reviews.title: Your Never to Old
reviews.text: I was most impressed with the societies view to offer older people mortgages. our process was not plain sailing but they managed to keep the offer open and we are very pleased with the way they have operatedand kept us informed

reviews.title: DON'T GO ANYWHERE ELSE
reviews.text: I can honestly say Austin and the Beverley have been excellent from start to finish. We had a self build mortgage from them and the service was brilliant.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: Fast, professional, Service with a smile.

reviews.title: Competitive, Friendly, Efficient
reviews.text: When I initially rang re opening an account the lady was extremely helpful and supportive. Not pushing me to go online. My name was added to a list to guarantee the current interest rate. From posting me forms to me returning them and account opening was about 1 week. Paper work was clear and easy to complete. All very prompt - excellent - thank you.

reviews.title: Local, Efficient, Good Service
reviews.text: Local, Friendly staff, all in branch.

reviews.title: Excellent, Individual, Service
reviews.text: Friendly staff - easy to talk to - knowledgeable on your products - prompt attention.

reviews.title: Safe, Reliable, Friendly
reviews.text: Staff always helpful and friendly, an account for everyone. I like a passbook to record my transitions but can use the internet to very m accounts. I like the convenience to pop in to the branch when shopping in Beverley also I like the way they help and support the community.

reviews.title: Efficient, Helpful, Fair
reviews.text: I recently opened a fixed rate bond and contacted the BBS by phone for application forms. The service received from Andrea Waller was exceptional. She was able to answer my queries and forms were received very quickly.

reviews.title: Supportive, Friendly, Helpful
reviews.text: Permit customers to transact as they wish e.g. by post.

reviews.title: Professional, Friendly, Efficient
reviews.text: Local BS in Beverley. Very friendly and efficient.

reviews.title: Absolutely, the, Bees' knees
reviews.text: Organised very pleasant staff, good advice. Feel welcome every time however busy at the office.

reviews.title: Local, efficient, friendly
reviews.text: I like that its local with very helpful and friendly staff it could not be better.

reviews.title: Local, Friendly, Helpful
reviews.text: Local branch with very friendly and helpful staff, welcoming. Nice to talk to a human being and not a recorded message or a robot.

reviews.title: Straight-Forward, Person Oriented, Supportive.

reviews.title: Caring, Fair, Honest
reviews.text: My grandfather opened an account for me in 1951 and I have held one to this day. Always been helpful and feel appreciated. No reason to do anything if it aint broke don't fix it.

reviews.title: Friendly, Helpful, Approachable
reviews.text: That you can talk to real people and the branch is still open and not online and I like tat they raise money for good causes.

reviews.title: Local, Service, Reputation
reviews.text: Local and able to visit in person. No need to make an appointment - a face to face desk would be better.

reviews.title: Helpful, Accessible, Happy
reviews.text: I like that I can open an account in joint names for my grandson and granddaughter and get a book and choose how much we can put in at anytime.

reviews.title: Efficient, Local, Comprehensive
reviews.text: ISA transfer - very efficiently processed. Very straight forward. No issues at all.

reviews.title: Efficient, Friendly, Supportive

reviews.title: Welcoming, Professional, Friendly
reviews.text: The staff are very friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: Convenient, Friendly, Informed
reviews.text: The branch always seems to be busy but there is only ever one cashier on when other people are sat behind the screens surely if they see a queue they should open.

reviews.title: Excellent, Efficient, Service
reviews.text: Easy to do business with passbook. No apps, passwords etc necessary.

reviews.title: Local, Friendly, Value
reviews.text: Whilst every visit has, of course, an economic purpose, for me, it is always a happy social occasion.

reviews.title: Accessible, Reliable and professional, Helpful and Pleasant.
reviews.text: Love the cosy feel of the BS - small customer area but easy and good to access to the professional staff with privacy. When busy one thinks why only one counter open but in truth with staffing and patience - dose not effect the marvellous service.

reviews.title: Super, Recommended, Company
reviews.text: You offer a good interest rate and all your staff are very nice! I cant think of anything you could do better.

reviews.title: Efficient, Economical, Fabulous
reviews.text: Efficient stamped address envelopes supplied, online access would be great.

reviews.title: Professional, Friendly, Local
reviews.text: Polite, Knowledgeable staff, Open hours are great.

reviews.title: Professional, Traditional, Friendly
reviews.text: Having a "pass book" may seem old fashioned but it is nice to bale to refer to it without an online service. Personable staff who ere keen to help.

reviews.title: Face to Face, Excellent, Informative
reviews.text: We like the personal service. It is wonderful to know we can drop in / make an appointment to speak in person with someone. We have always been given an excellent service. Very much appreciated. Thank you.

reviews.title: Friendly, Professional, Knowledgable
reviews.text: Being able to speak with a member of staff - no matter how small an issue. Staff help you to resolve. No call centre, online chat or Chat bot. Thank you for good old fashioned service!! 10/10.

reviews.text: The staff where able to explain and answer all our questions.

reviews.title: Efficient, Professional, Brilliant

reviews.title: Good, Local, Service
reviews.text: We like the fact there is a local branch to visit unlike the majority of the branch that are closing down branches down. BBS could do mor to enable access online or mobile.

reviews.title: Brilliant, Building, Society
reviews.text: Very pleased with Beverly with my grandson opening a junior cash ISA having transferred from Halifax. All the staff are extremely customer focused and lovely to deal with nothing is ever to much to do for them. The interest rate is very good and really nothing to consider needed to be changed. Excellent organisation.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, open!
reviews.text: As a new customer I found the staff very helpful, and as you open 6 days a week amazing and just what I am looking for.

reviews.title: Professional, efficient, clear
reviews.text: Transactions dealt with swiftly and accurately. Product information clear. Products seem to be looking less attractive compared to other building societies.

reviews.title: Excellence is standard
reviews.text: Very friendly staff. Very competitive interest rates. Not a soul-less huge organisation. Caring staff. Forms always available. No-rush service. Only one thing to make my experience better: please notice I have ticked CHAPS, not faster.

reviews.title: Helpful, friendly, kind
reviews.text: The staff are always friendly and you actually speak to someone face-to-face. Not online etc. Wouldn't change anything. The best place to bank.

reviews.title: Effective, helpful, friendly
reviews.text: Banking as it was 40 years ago; so simple, so easy and staff so helpful. Perfect as it is - please don't change!!.

reviews.title: Efficient, friendly, reassuring
reviews.text: I feel they're always available to help over the phone and being the high street is very important to me. I've been extremely happy and confident in their services.

reviews.title: Very friendly and helpful
reviews.text: Nothing to improve, it was hassle-free friendly service.

reviews.title: Personal, helpful, convenient
reviews.text: The staff are friendly and helpful. During the recent period of sorting my father's financial affairs after his passing, the sympathetic response was most touching and appreciated.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, approachable
reviews.text: Like the people, having a passbook, someone real I can talk to. Maybe having at somepoint a debit card for the account would be good, otherwise I think they are all great.

reviews.title: Helpful, Friendly, Caring
reviews.text: It's so wonderful you can walk in and get help saving etc by the wonderful friendly staff, there and you don't have to do everything on line you get incredible service here.

reviews.title: Happy, efficient, helpful

reviews.title: Friendly, positive, safe

reviews.title: Friendly, Efficient, Knowledgeable
reviews.text: Branch service. Polite, knowledgeable, helpful staff. This is true of all of the counter staff in Beverley.

reviews.title: Helpful, pleasant, informative
reviews.text: The staff are very pleasant and helpful.

reviews.title: Welcoming, helpful, friendly
reviews.text: I left a high street bank I banked with for many years as I felt under valued as a customer. Straightaway I feel valued and wanted as a customer here at the Beverley Building Society. Staff member Andrea was kind and very helpful.

reviews.title: Helpful, respect, friendly
reviews.text: Local and easy access for us, always seems to be plenty of staff to help us and no queues which is a definite plus. This is how building societies used to be before trying to compete with banks ignoring savers.

reviews.title: Local, friendly, welcoming
reviews.text: Warm and friendly staff. Could not do enough for us. A member of staff even came with us to find out why HSBC could not transfer our money over to you - said they need a CHAPS number or something.

reviews.title: Local, open branch
reviews.text: Face-to-face staff to deal with. I don't want to do everything online. I like to have a passbook.

reviews.text: Very pleased with the service and comms. 4.25% on a 2-year ISA is a bit skinny.

reviews.text: The efficiency of your service in dealing with any question is great.

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.text: A great, helpful building society from walking in to walking out. Staff polite and friendly and they are always so helpful to the customer.

reviews.title: Helpful, friendly, happy
reviews.text: It's always a joy to go into the Beverley Building Society, the counter staff are always friendly and very helpful.

reviews.title: Friendly
reviews.text: I like being able to speak to someone without having to wait or being told to do online banking.

reviews.title: Professional, friendly, local
reviews.text: When my mum passed away the staff were lovely, helpful and professional. Also, when I brought my document account book in they sorted it out straight away for me, brilliant customer service.

reviews.title: Quick, simple, efficicent
reviews.text: Quick, simple, efficient. Friendly staff.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful , customer-focused
reviews.text: Staff are friendly, helpful and have time for you.

reviews.title: Friendly, personal service
reviews.text: It is local, adaptable and versatile.

reviews.title: Friendly, efficient, quick
reviews.text: The friendly, efficient staff. Nothing could make my experience better.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, available
reviews.text: I have always been with this building society, they are helpful and friendly.

reviews.title: Pleasant, courteous, small
reviews.text: The Beverley as a one branch building society is a very good service provider. The staff are pleasant and knowledgeable. Their service is both prompt and accurate.

reviews.title: Friendly, reassuring, professional
reviews.text: It would be very helpful if the Beverley Building Society could install one or two low-level counters for people in wheelchairs.

reviews.title: Efficient, helpful, friendly
reviews.text: I do like the face-to-face contact, so questions and answers can be given there and then, and can be easily in touch. Also you location suits me.

reviews.title: Personal, accessible, reliable
reviews.text: Beverley Building Society listens, thinks and acts outside the box, treats customers as human beings and not as a number and the staff really do know their customers and care about them, thank you.

reviews.title: Branch, friendly, mutual
reviews.text: Very friendly staff plus you have a branch I can visit. I much prefer this option for interaction than online.

reviews.title: Helpful, professional, friendly
reviews.text: The branch is in the high street, face-to-face contact, and being able to speak to a member of staff.

reviews.title: Efficient, professional, accurate
reviews.text: I have always found the Society to be very professional - efficient and accurate with transactions/requests dealt with promptly.

reviews.title: Local, friendly, efficient
reviews.text: The staff are very friendly and immediately put me at ease on this my first visit. The procedure was explained fully and the transaction was dealt with with the minimum of fuss.

reviews.title: Friendly, professional, local
reviews.text: The staff are very nice and helpful. Debbie is really nice and looks after us and she is lovely.

reviews.title: Welcoming, efficient, courteous
reviews.text: More privacy would have been appreciated when opening an account etc. - in a separate room/area?.

reviews.title: Local, helpful
reviews.text: Product was what was required, and in an accessible location.

reviews.title: Quick and efficient service from staff.
reviews.text: Quick and efficient service from staff.

reviews.title: Friendly, local, independent
reviews.text: A local branch with friendly staff.

reviews.title: Friendly, professional, helpful
reviews.text: Friendly and patient staff - accessible location for me.

reviews.title: Outstanding, friendly, service
reviews.text: Personal, friendly, understanding, first rate service.

reviews.title: Friendly, local-based, fair
reviews.text: Personal service, mutual society.

reviews.title: Efficient and user friendly
reviews.text: Opening a new account was fuss free, and not bogged down with forms and checks. I felt like I was recognised as a law abiding citizen and not a money launderer trying to defraud the system. V. well done.

reviews.title: Excellent, helpful, always pleasant staff
reviews.text: Staff are always pleasant and helpful and when I send passbook etc. through the post it is returned within three days - excellent service.

reviews.title: Pleasant, helpful, quick
reviews.text: No problems, everybody was pleasant and helpful.

reviews.title: Cheerful, friendly, proactive
reviews.text: Cheerful, friendly and proactive.

reviews.title: Smart money machine
reviews.text: Great savings accounts. Fab staff! Nothing to improve all "hunky dory"!.

reviews.title: Confidence to invest
reviews.text: Old-style passbook accounts, and good rate very competitve.

reviews.title: Trustworthy, sound, reliable
reviews.text: Always polite, helpful, knowledgeable counter staff who are far from officious - they are happy to help and advise. A safe. Local place to look after savings. The public reception area gives the customer a welcome but business-like feeling.

reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, good value
reviews.text: Friendly, helpful staff, also Saturday opening, also do not try to get you to bank online as we like the personal service.

reviews.title: Lawyers used by Beverley were very efficient and hel...
reviews.text: Lawyers used by Beverley were very efficient and helpful

reviews.title: Trusting, reliable, helpful
reviews.text: The experience I have had over the years with Beverley Building Society have been perfect, really appreciate the help I have been given.

reviews.title: Efficient, friendly, sympathetic
reviews.text: Friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff. Good interest rates. Pleasant office environment.

reviews.title: Independent, accessible, excellent
reviews.text: It's local, independent, accessible in person and offers good financial products for most people.

reviews.title: Helpful, friendly, good value
reviews.text: Speaking to real people quickly and easily who can answer you questions.

reviews.title: Convenient, independent, established
reviews.text: Local, accessible and with an excellent rate of interest for my needs.

reviews.title: Beverley Building Society Listens and Helps
reviews.text: I've been with Beverley Building Society 13 years and they have been exceptional with my requirements. Nothing has been a problem, excellent communications. Friendly staff and very helpful. What more could you ask for.!

reviews.title: Super friendly and personal service.
reviews.text: Super friendly and personal service. Most building societies / banks make you feel like see a number on a screen, the Beverley team make you feel human and take everything to account when dealing with yku.

reviews.title: Beverley Building Society Branch Review
reviews.text: Great staff, fab accounts when available! (Savings). Everything "hunky dory"!.

reviews.title: Fantastic service
reviews.text: At every step of the way, the Beverley Building Society was so helpful. They made what is usually a stressful process very easy. In addition, every member of staff is always so friendly and pleasant to deal with. A big thank you.
